sentences.en: Another group received cognitive behavioral therapy, sometimes called the talking treatment.
sentences.cn: 另一组则使用认知行为疗法, 该疗法有时被称为谈话治疗.

sentences.en: As children grow older, their cognitive processes become sharper.
sentences.cn: 孩子们越长越大，他们的认知过程变得更为敏锐。

sentences.en: Cognitive consonance is a consistency between the knowledge , ideas and beliefs .
sentences.cn: 认识一致是知识、思想和信念之间的一致。

sentences.en: Cognitive consonance is a consistency between the knowledge, ideas and beliefs.
sentences.cn: 认识一致是知识 、 思想和信念之间的一致.

sentences.en: Emotion influences cognitive and the motivation of behavior. are imbued with emotion.
sentences.cn: 情绪影响认知,也影响行为的动机.

sentences.en: Empathy has been conceived as being a cognitive process or an emotional cognitive one.
sentences.cn: 移情被认为是一种认知过程或一种情绪认知过程.

sentences.en: Many geriatricians recommend vitamin E for mild cognitive decline.
sentences.cn: 许多老年病学专家主张服用维生素E,来治疗轻度的认知衰退.

sentences.en: Metaphor has been the key task in the cognitive linguistic research.
sentences.cn: 摘要隐喻贯穿于人类一切自然语言和思维之中,是认知语义学研究的重点之一.

sentences.en: Nine did , while 19 developed mild cognitive impairment, which can worsen Alzheimers.
sentences.cn: 另外有19人有轻微的认知损伤, 而这一症状则可恶化为老年痴呆症.

sentences.en: Our soul possesses two cognitive powers.
sentences.cn: 我们的灵魂具有两种认知力量.

sentences.en: Theories in cognitive psychology are attempts to summarize large sets of data.
sentences.cn: 认知心理学的各种理论都是试图概括大套的资料.

sentences.en: There is inconsistence about the cognitive impairment profile in VCI.
sentences.cn: 关于VCI的认知损害特征研究众多,但结果仍存在分歧.

sentences.en: This article reviews the molecular mechanism and genetics of vascular cognitive impairment.
sentences.cn: 文章就血管性认知障碍的分子机制和遗传学等方面做了综述.

sentences.en: Title: Recovery of Cognitive Function After Surgery for Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 标题: 动脉瘤性蛛网膜下腔出血术后认知功能的恢复.
